explains: vi. 重新组合；重新编组

sentences.en: After its election defeat, the party needs to regroup.
sentences.cn: 选举失败后，这个党需要改组。

sentences.en: Summer is a time to relax, regroup and catch up on all those things you've been putting off all year.
sentences.cn: 夏天是休养整顿、并处理一年中积压事务的时候。

sentences.en: It would regroup and reappear in the rear.
sentences.cn: 他们会在后方重新组合出现。
